Package com.konakart.db

Interface Summary
DbPortabilityIf For defining database-specific rules
 

Class Summary
DbPortabilityDB2 Standard rules for DB2
DbPortabilityImpl Superclass for DBPortability implementations
DbPortabilityMSSql Standard rules for MS SQL Server
DbPortabilityMySql Standard rules for MySQL
DbPortabilityOracle Standard rules for Oracle
DbPortabilityPostgreSql Standard rules for PostgreSQL
KKBasePeer This is the base class for all Peer classes in the system.
KKCriteria KKCriteria
KKDB2NetAdapter This is used to connect to a DB2 database.
KKDbMapMgr This is a manager for manipulating the Torque dbMaps
KKQuery Used to assemble an SQL SELECT query.
KKQuery.FromElement This class describes an Element in the From-part of a SQL clause.
KKRecord A utility class used to enable KonaKart to work with different databases
KKSearch KKSearch object
KKTorque Various utilities for using Torque in KonaKart
KKTypeMap KonaKart Type Mapper
KKVillageUtils Some Village related code factored out of the BasePeer.
